pages.text: JourneyMap is a comprehensive mapping mod that provides real-time maps of your world. $(br2)View explored areas, mark waypoints, and never get lost again with this powerful tool!

To open the full-screen map, press 'J' (by default). $(br2)Create waypoints by right-clicking anywhere on the map, and toggle them on or off as needed. $(br2)JourneyMap also lets you track mobs, animals, and players, making exploration safer and easier.

Configure JourneyMap with the following popular tips: $(br2)- Set 'Waypoint Beacons' to 'ON' for visible markers in the world. $(br2)- In 'Map Options', change 'Mob Display' to 'Friendly/Hostile' for tracking animals and enemies. $(br2)- Enable 'Day/Night Toggle' to switch between day and night views.
